text: Juan Guzmán (died 1605) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Patriarch of West Indies (1602–1605)."Patriarch Juan Guzmán" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved August 27, 2016 ==Biography== On 15 Nov 1602, Juan Guzmán was appointed during the papacy of Pope Clement VIII as Patriarch of West Indies. He served as Patriarch of West Indies until his death in 1605. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Clement VIII Category:1605 deaths
title: Juan Guzmán (patriarch)
